name: MyWorld - Frozen Kingdom
detailed_description:
The Frozen Kingdom DLC is FREE to all MyWorld users - our way of saying thank you to all those supporting us in Early Access. Frozen Kingdom brings you 88 high quality items, from new Character Creator pieces to whole new buildings and enemies.





Here's a full list of the contents:

34 Character Creator items

54 Editor items

Buildings

  • Winter Ruin 1
  • Winter Ruin 2
  • Winter Ruin 3
  • Winter Ruin 4
  • Winter Castle
  • Winter Castle 2
  • Winter Tent
  • Winter Tent 2

Walls and Fences

  • Winter Column
  • Winter Wall Long
  • Winter Wall Short
  • Winter Wall Entrance

Gameplay Objects

  • Winter Portal

Collectables

  • Fish Collectable
  • Ice Collectable

Rocks

  • Ice Shards 1
  • Ice Shards 2
  • Ice Shards 3
  • Ice Shards 4
  • Winter Rock 1
  • Winter Rock 2
  • Winter Rock 3

Big Items

  • Frozen Fountain
  • Winter Cart
  • Floor Ice 1
  • Floor Ice 2
  • Winter Circle
  • Winter Pelt 1
  • Winter Pelt 2
  • Winter Skeleton
  • Winter Skeleton Seated
  • Winter Table
  • Winter Statue 1
  • Winter Statue 2
  • Winter Statue 3
  • Winter Statue 4

Small Items

  • Winter Barrel
  • Winter Barrel Fish
  • Winter Chair
  • Winter Fish
  • Winter Ornament 1
  • Winter Ornament 2
  • Winter Ornament 3

Enemies

  • Frozen Skeleton Hatchet
  • Frozen Skeleton Club
  • Rock Golem

Bosses

  • Frozen Demon

NPC's

  • NPC Winter 1
  • NPC Winter 2

Lights

  • Winter Lamp 1
  • Winter Wall Light

Wall Fixtures

  • Icicles


The Frozen Kingdom DLC will remain free of charge as long as MyWorld is in Early Access.

short_description: Frozen Kingdom DLC is free to all MyWorld users and brings you 88 high quality items, from new Character Creator pieces to whole new buildings and enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Shader Model 5 capable GPU
  • Sound Card: DirectX11 Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Shader Model 5 capable GPU
  • Sound Card: DirectX11 Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
